data.message:
Marshall Bruce Mathers we all believe in you man.Your rap is real,has an impact and it motivates.You inspire me to push myself over the limits and your rap is real.Unlike these other bourgous rappers like lil wayne ,jay z and a bunch of them who have no themes behind their rap.Its money this ,bitches that which is all crap.They dont even know what real hardcore rap is man.EMINEM YOU ARE THE RAP GOD and all these other rappers are POOR MANS SERVANTS
.EMINEM YOU  THE REALEST RAPPER,BEST RAPPER ALIVE,BEST RAPPER OF ALL TIME,BEST RAPPER EVER.Its what I keep on telling the MTV BASE Facebook page when they post crap that jay z is arguably the best rapper alive.Theres nothing to argue on there,EMINEM IS THE BEST RAPPER ALIVE EVEN WHEN HES DEAD HE WILL BE STILL THE BEST RAPPER ALIVE.I BELIEVE IN YOU MAN.
